mapper.select: SELECT s.slb_name as slb_name, c.crs_id as crs_id FROM syllabus s, course c WHERE s.slb_id = c.slb_id
INSERT INTO enrollment_detail VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(enrd_id)+1,0) FROM enrollment_detail), #{courseVO.id}, #{memberVO.id}, '신청', sysdate, sysdate, sysdate)

SELECT e.enrd_id as enrd_id, e.mem_id as mem_id, m.mem_phone as mem_phone, m.mem_name as mem_name, m.mem_email as mem_email, m.mem_company_name as mem_company_name, s.slb_name as slb_name, e.enrd_stat as enrd_stat, enrd_join_date as enrd_join_date FROM enrollment_detail E LEFT JOIN member M ON e.mem_id = m.mem_id LEFT JOIN course C ON e.crs_id = c.crs_id LEFT JOIN syllabus S ON c.slb_id = s.slb_id WHERE enrd_stat IN ('신청', '승인', '수료')

select m.mem_name, m.mem_id, m.mem_phone, m.mem_email, m.mem_company_name, substr(e.enrd_join_date, 1, 10) as enrd_join_date, e.enrd_stat, e.enrd_complete_date, s.slb_type, s.slb_category, s.slb_name, s.slb_report_name, c.crs_classroom, substr(c.crs_rs_date, 1, 10) as crs_rs_date, substr(c.crs_re_date, 1, 10) as crs_re_date, substr(c.crs_start_date, 1, 10) as crs_start_date, substr(c.crs_end_date, 1, 10) as crs_end_date, substr(c.crs_start_time, 11, 6) as crs_start_time, substr(crs_end_time, 11, 6) as crs_end_time, c.crs_capacity, s.slb_days, s.slb_time from enrollment_detail E LEFT JOIN member M ON e.mem_id = m.mem_id LEFT JOIN course C ON e.crs_id = c.crs_id LEFT JOIN syllabus S ON c.slb_id = s.slb_id where enrd_id=#{id}
